text: Blackout is a demonic supervillain from the Marvel Comics universe. The character was created by Howard Mackie and Javier Saltares, and first appeared in Ghost Rider vol. 3 #2 (June 1990). He is a Lilian, a race of demon that are the spawns of the Mother of Demons, Lilith. He is an enemy of the Ghost Rider, notably Johnny Blaze and Danny Ketch. == In other media == A character named after Blackout is portrayed by Johnny Whitworth in the 2012 movie Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance. Category:Marvel Comics supervillains
title: Blackout (Lilin)
